@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.weapons

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Attack
    This interface schematizes an attack, which is the effect that a weapon has on one or more targets
    TargetCalculator
    This interface schematizes all the possible ways to calculate which damageable entities are actual targets
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompoundTargetCalculator
    This class uses other classes implementing TargetCalculator in order to cover more complex target position requirements
    FixedDirectionTargetCalculator
    This class is a TargetCalculator that finds targets in a straight line from the starting point
    FixedDistanceTargetCalculator
    This class is a TargetCalculator that finds targets that is in a fixed range of moves away from the starting point
    FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator
    This class is a TargetCalculator that finds targets that are (or are not) visible from the starting point
    Weapon
    This class represents the most basic type of weapon of the game, which only has a basic attack
    WeaponWithAlternative
    This class inherits from the basic weapon and adds an alternative attack that can be used instead of the basic one
    WeaponWithMultipleEffects
    This class inherits from the basic weapon and it also offers powered attacks that can be used together with the basic attack
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Attack.TargetType
    This enum differentiates the possible type of targets of an attack
